thread.title: South Carolina city to pay $6.5 million to family of fleeing man shot by cop
thread.title_full: South Carolina city to pay $6.5 million to family of fleeing man shot by cop

title: South Carolina city to pay $6.5 million to family of fleeing man shot by cop
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun News - Today 
A city in South Carolina approved a $6.5 million settlement Thursday with the family of an unarmed black man shot to death earlier this year...
